## LoaderOptions.dracoDecoderPath property

A path to that contains the draco library. e.g: `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.160.0/examples/jsm/libs/draco` - Default: `undefined`

**Signature:**

```typescript
dracoDecoderPath?: string;
```
